titleStmt.title: The guide of honour, or the ballance wherin she may weigh her actions A discourse written (by way of humble advise) by the author then residing in forreigne parts, to a truely noble lord of England his most honour'd friend. Worthy the perusall of all who are gently or nobly borne, whom it instructeth how to carry themselves in both fortunes with applause and security. / By Antony Stafford, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: By T[homas] C[otes] for S. Cartwright, dwelling at the Bible in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with T. Slater as publisher in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
